group_1.textRight: The Labyrinth surrounding the water park@has vanished...

group_1.textLeft: Yes... It should be safe now.

group_1.textRight: I never thought you'd beat us to it.

group_1.textLeft: ...I had a feeling that Madoka and everyone else@would hesitate.

group_1.textRight: ...You might be right about that.
As a person... No, that's not right.
As your senior, it should have been my@responsibility.
Thank you, Homura.

group_1.textLeft: No...it was nothing.

group_1.textRight: You were right to move so quickly.

group_1.textLeft: Kyubey...!

group_1.textRight: No Witch would let go of its prey once@it's been caught.
Now that her wish has run its course,@there's nothing holding it back.
I wouldn't have been surprised if it had@pounced at a moment's notice.

group_1.textLeft: ...Sheesh, whose fault do ya think that is?
Excuse me, Kyubey.
I have one question for you.

group_1.textRight: What is it?

group_1.textLeft: The UFO that was sent here...
Could your kind have been responsible for it?
If the UFO was made by Kyubey...
Does that mean it's from a real alien?

group_1.textRight: Yes.
Manatsu's parents' dream would've become@a reality...
But if it was just a magical hallucination,@then I feel sorry for Manatsu.

group_1.textLeft: ...If Manatsu had wished for a real UFO...
I'm sure the wish would have come true, but...

group_1.textRight: I see, so that's what you're curious about.
The truth isâ€”

group_1.textLeft: Ah, hold on a moment!
Actually, I don't think you should answer@that question.

group_1.textRight: Have you changed your mind?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I don't want to know after all.
If it was your kind's spaceship, then it's real.
If it's made by other aliens, that's something@straight out of science fiction.
I guess it's up to Manatsu's parents to figure@out the truth.
Yes, that's why.

group_1.textRight: Okay then, I take it you're withdrawing your@question?
...Hey, Mami!
Where'd you guys go?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, I'm sorry.@We're coming back.

group_1.textRight: ...I'm getting sleepy...

group_1.textLeft: Right, I suppose we should make our way@back home.
Shall we say hello to Manatsu's family@one last time?

group_1.textRight: Okay!
